transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Shanu ji Shubham baat kar raha tha fir India Mart se good afternoon sir.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Kaise hain sir aap theek hain?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Ji actually isliye call kiya tha maine aapko ki abhi aapka na discussion hua tha hamari staff ke sath 19 tarikh ko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapka discussion hua tha Annu ji hai aapke yaha pe unke sath.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To uska discussion ka sir ek feedback mail message aapke pass aaya hoga and that is for your representative Avneesh Kumar jo Avneesh Kumar ka feedback aata hai sir. Ki aapki staff se jo baat hui hai usse aap satisfied hai ya nahi hai?
Customer: Achha theek hai.
Executive: Ji to aapne wo not satisfied.
Customer: Achha theek hai main usko work ke liye bhej deta hu na.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aapne not satisfied kar diya. Shanu ji mujhe ye janna tha ki problem hai sir account manager se to please bataiye.
Customer: Matlab aapko review mil gaya?
Executive: Haan ji not satisfied aapne diya hai sir review mil chuka hai hame.
Customer: Actual mein kya hai ki jo India Mart hai na teen se char mobile mein khula hua hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: To wo Sir wo aapke mobile number pe aaya hoga sir aapke whatsapp pe aaya hoga aapne not satisfied kar diya hai sir use.
Customer: Aisa main screenshot bhej deta hu agar maine kara ho to batao.
Executive: Are nahi nahi sir wo to khair mere pass aa gaya ab mujhe ye janna tha aapse ki koi issue hai to please bataiye sir services se related ya account manager se related ab aap ticket open ho gaya hai hamare end pe aap bataiye to sahi kya problem hai.
Customer: Actual mein kya hai ki wo jo Annu madam hai na wo sara enjoy karte hain India Mart ka.
Executive: Are sir.
Customer: To aap ek baar unse baat kariye please.
Executive: Sir unse to hum baat kar hi rahe hain to fir matlab main sir fir ye bataiye mujhe ki ye fir ye concern to close kar du Shanu sir ye aapne jo employee ke liye not satisfied diya hai.
Customer: Isko cancel karna hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi main puch raha hu basically kya hota hai aap samjhiye Shanu ji kya hota hai aap man lo mera koi account manager aap ya aapki team se baat karta hai. Ab India Mart kya hai ki aapke account manager ki uski wo leti hai ki bhai koi usne call pe aisi cheez to nahi boli jo aapko sahi na lagi ho. Yaar nahi ye basic etiquettes hai ya nahi to uske liye feedback aata hai. Ab wo feedback negative hai sir. Agar aapka account manager ke sath sari cheeze sahi hai to main sir ye concern close kar du.
Customer: Haan kar dijiye na close wo actual mein kya hai maine feel nahi kara hai teen se char hamare jo aur staff hai na wo bhi to aap aap se ek request hai sir request hai aapse ek main concern close kar de raha hu mail pe aapke pass ek feedback aayega waha pe please satisfied mark kar dijiyega wo to kar denge sir.
Customer: Haan haan theek hai.
Executive: Mail pe aapke pass aayega primary mail pe wo please satisfied mark kar dijiyega Shanu ji.
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai.
Executive: Rest hum ek baar Annu ji se baat kar lete hain chalega sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Okay thank you sir. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked 'not satisfied' for employee feedback.

- Customer states IndiaMART is open on multiple devices.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the purpose of feedback.

- Executive agreed to close the concern.

- Executive will talk to Annu ji.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark 'satisfied' on feedback email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, account manager, satisfaction, concern
